00022 #include "fileio.hpp"

00024 /*
00025  * Here, we choose the right implementation using
00026  * conditional compilation.
00027  */
00028 
00029 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(WIN32)
00030 #include "win32_file.hpp"
00031 #else
00032 #include "linux_file.hpp"
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 /*
00036  * This class is a proxy for specific implementation.
00037  */
00038 
00039 namespace uStreamLib {
00040         /*
00041         * Implementation of FileInputStream.
00042         */
00043 
00044         FileInputStream::FileInputStream(void):Object(UOSUTIL_RTTI_FILE_INPUT_STREAM)
00045         {
00046                 _impl = new Impl_File();
00047         }
00048 
00049         FileInputStream::~FileInputStream(void)
00050         {
00051                 close();
00052                 delete _impl;
00053         }
00054 
00055         int32 FileInputStream::init(char* filename)
00056         {
00057                 int32 ret = 0;
00058 
00059                 // initialize error string
00060                 ret = _error.init("No error");
00061                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00062                         return FAILURE;
00063 
00064                 // invoke implementation
00065                 ret = _impl->openFile(filename, FILE_MODE_READ);
00066                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00067                         return FAILURE;
00068 
00069                 // ok
00070                 return SUCCESS;
00071         }
00072 
00073         void FileInputStream::close(void)
00074         {
00075                 _impl->closeFile();
00076         }
00077

00079         {
00080                 UOSUTIL_DERR((stderr, "FileInputStream::mark() ** UNSUPPORTED **\n"));
00081         }

00084         {
00085                 return false;

00103         int32 FileInputStream::read(DataBuf* buf)
00104         {
00105                 int32 ret = _impl->readFile(buf->getAddr(), buf->getSize());
00106                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00107                         return FAILURE;
00108 
00109                 buf->setCount(ret);
00110                 return ret;
00111         }
00112 
00113         int32 FileInputStream::read(DataBuf* buf, uint32 offset, uint32 size)
00114         {
00115                 char* addr = (char*) buf->getAddr();
00116                 uint32 toread = 0, readable = 0;
00117                 int32 ret = 0;
00118 
00119                 if (size > buf->getSize()) {
00120                         _error.xcopy("size greater than buffer size"); return FAILURE;
00121                 }
00122                 if (offset >= size || offset >= buf->getSize()) {
00123                         _error.xcopy("invalid offset"); return FAILURE;
00124                 }
00125 
00126                 readable = buf->getSize() - offset;
00127                 if (size >= readable)
00128                         toread = readable;
00129                 else
00130                         toread = size;
00131 
00132                 ret = _impl->readFile(&addr[offset], toread);
00133                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00134                         return FAILURE;
00135 
00136                 buf->setCount(offset + ret);
00137                 return ret;
00138         }
00139 
00140         int32 FileInputStream::reset(void)
00141         {
00142                 UOSUTIL_DERR((stderr, "FileInputStream::reset() ** UNSUPPORTED **\n"));
00143                 return 0;
00144         }
00145 
00146         int32 FileInputStream::skip(int32 n)
00147         {
00148                 return _impl->skip(n);
00149         }

00166         int32 FileOutputStream::init(char* filename, int32 mode)
00167         {
00168                 int32 ret = 0;
00169 
00170                 // initialize error string
00171                 ret = _error.init("No error");
00172                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00173                         return FAILURE;
00174 
00175                 // invoke implementation
00176                 ret = _impl->openFile(filename, mode);
00177                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00178                         return FAILURE;
00179 
00180                 // ok
00181                 return SUCCESS;
00182         }

00204         int32 FileOutputStream::write(DataBuf* buf)
00205         {
00206                 return _impl->writeFile(buf->getAddr(), buf->getCount());
00207         }
00208 
00209         int32 FileOutputStream::write(DataBuf* buf, uint32 offset, uint32 size)
00210         {
00211                 char* addr = (char*) buf->getAddr();
00212                 uint32 towrite = 0, writeable = 0;
00213 
00214                 if (size > buf->getCount()) {
00215                         _error.xcopy("size greater than buffer size"); return FAILURE;
00216                 }
00217                 if (offset >= size || offset >= buf->getCount()) {
00218                         _error.xcopy("invalid offset"); return FAILURE;
00219                 }
00220 
00221                 writeable = buf->getCount() - offset;
00222                 if (size >= writeable)
00223                         towrite = writeable;
00224                 else
00225                         towrite = size;
00226 
00227                 return _impl->writeFile(&addr[offset], towrite);
00228         }
